resources.string: Hello and welcome to our app, this is a small project aiming to create an environment for children and adults alike to learn, experiment and have fun with our robot and basic programming concepts \n\n
"Manual mode lets you control the robot yourself, you can make turns, go forward, backward or any other action you want \n\n"
"Auto control will make the robot do an actions of its own choice \n\n"
"Code control mode lets you easily create code to control the robot procedurally and therefore lets you learn or experiment with \n\n"
